item.title: Rockin Roary - All I Want For Christmas
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas Easy
All I Want For Christmas Is My two front Teeth Written by Don Gardener
Using the chords: Am C D7 E7 F G7
Suggested Strum Pattern: D DU D DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.

item.title: Ella Fitzgerald - Have Yourself A Merry Little Christmas
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas
Have Yourself A Merry Little Christmas - Ella Fitzgerald version
Using the chords: A7 Am B7 Bm C D D7 E7 Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Steven Universe - We Are the Crystal Gems
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele. Keys of F & G.
Chords Used: F, A7, Bb, C, Bbm, Gm7, Am7, Bbm7, E7, Am, Dm, G, Cmaj7, D7, C7, B7, Cm, Em, Gmaj7
As performed on Steven Universe
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/pdzcOAduI8E
******************** Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion.

item.title: Elvis Presley - Suspicious Minds
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Suspicious Minds - Elvis Presley Written by Mark James
Using the chords: Bm B7 C D D7 Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Percy Sledge - When a Man Loves a Woman
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
Chords Used: C, Am, Em, F, G7, D7
As performed by Percy Sliedge
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/_iXuaXJSGns
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. Background (modified to look like Taylor Swift's "Lover" album cover) is from motionbolt.com.

item.title: Lift Every Voice And Sing - Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
Lift Every Voice and Sing by the Abyssinian Baptist Church. It’s been lowered by 3 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: C, F, A7, Dm, Bbdim, Dm, Gm, A, Bb, D, D7
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. item.title: Joe Brown - Joe Brown - I'll See You In My Dreams - Jools Holland - 2008_UGC
item.description:
**NOT FOR BEGINNERS**
I'll See You In My Dreams by Joe Brown And The Bruvvers. For educational use. Chords Used: A7, Am, Bb, Bb6, Bb6-2, Bbm6, Bbmaj7, C, C7, Cm6, Cmaj7, D, D7, D7-2, D7(HI), D9, Dm, E7, E7-2, Edim, Em7, F, F/C, F6, F6-5, F7, Fmaj7, G7 (yes, this song uses 28 chords). The video is from YouTuber Elisa M. and may be found at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VWERLNXIZGc. The chord progressions I used were heavily inspired by Jim’s Ukulele Songbook, which may be found at https://ozbcoz.com/Songs/downloadpdf.php?ID=3748%2Csongbook&fbclid=IwAR2UAs9814iikntmCk_pnDdsa9bE964sFKWluY5DTEEr4dIH5qDr2sdSB50 .
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.description:
All About You by McFly. It’s been digitally lowered by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: C Am F G E7 C7 D7 Fm G+

item.title: So Long, Farewell The Goodbye Song - Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
So Long, Farewell (The Goodbye Song) from “Out of the Box”. It’s been digitally raised by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. This tutorial video was requested by a music teacher that wanted to use it to end classes. Chords Used: G C D7
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Guava Jam Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
Chords Used: C, Gsus4, G7, F, D7, Ab, C7
As performed by The Ka'au Crater Boys.
This song has become a part of the traditional ukulele repertoire as a solo (you can find versions on the web if you would like to learn it), but in this case, you will be acting as the "rhythm section" underneath the solo.
I did not create a tutorial for this video, and you can play any strumming pattern that goes along with the rhythm section.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6
We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
